medications.name: Zonegran
evidence_spans: MEDICATIONS: , Glyburide, Avandia, metformin, lisinopril, Lipitor, aspirin, metoprolol and Zonegran.
She was referred to Dr. XYZ and will be seeing him on August 8, 2006.
We also discussed with Ms. Hawkins the possibility of nerve block injection; however, at this point she is not interested.
She will be seeing Dr. XYZ for her neuropathies.

We made an appointment in endocrine clinic today for a counseling in terms of better diabetes control and she is responsible for trying to get her referral from her primary care physician to go for this consult.
If this is not effective, when she comes back on August 7, 2006 we will then consider other anticonvulsants such as Neurontin or Lyrica.

patient_summary: Ms. Hawkins has several medical conditions, including diabetes, high blood pressure, high cholesterol, a stroke, and diabetic retinopathy. She also has nerve problems in her hands and feet. She is being seen by Dr. XYZ for her neuropathies. She needs to get her diabetes under control and is being referred to an endocrinologist. She is not interested in a nerve block injection at this time. She needs to follow up with Dr. XYZ on August 8, 2006, and possibly again on August 7, 2006, depending on how she responds to Zonegran.

missing_info.why_required: To determine if Zonegran is effective

notes: If a field has no value, use null. If a list has no items, use []
evidence_spans must be EXACT substrings copied from the note, max 20 words each
